creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
markings:
inscriptions, in Hebrew, from Proverbs 31:25:
Strength and dignity are her clothing
and she laugheth at the time to come

throughout; 'HANDMADE ISRAEL/BY M. ENDE', 'SILVER', 'ME [in script]' and 2 symbols, stamped, on bottom
text: The Smiths commissioned this Hanukkah lamp in memory of their daughter Marjorie.
title: Hanukkah lamp
